DOC.brief_summary: A study to evaluate the tolerability and acceptability of an investigational eye drop formulation in patients with Dry Eye Disease.
DOC.brief_title: A Study to Compare a New Eye Drop Formulation With Systane® Gel Drops and Genteal® Lubricant Gel Drops for Moderate to Severe Dry Eye Relief
DOC.criteria: Current use of an artificial tear product Visual Acuity of at least 20/40 (while wearing glasses, if necessary). Use of contact lenses in the last 3 months, or anticipated use of contact lenses during the study Cataract surgery, laserassisted in situ keratomileusis (LASIK), photorefractive keratectomy within 6 months Use of RESTASIS® Cyclosporine Ophthalmic Emulsion or any topical cyclosporine within 3 months Diagnosis of glaucoma.
